Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.server

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.Observable<Message>
it.polimi.ingsw.view.server.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<Response>
public class VirtualView
extends Observable<Message>
implements Observer<Response>
Class that represents the VirtualView of a Specific Client Server Side
Since:
2020/06/26
